channel.title: [PI] BrokenX Version 2
channel.description:
[center][b][size=36pt]BrokenX V2[/size][/b][/center]
[center]Hello everyone. I know a lot of people have been waiting for v2, so here it is! If you're expecting a huge difference from v1, you'll probably be disappointed. BrokenX Version 2 is mostly bug & glitch fixes, useful edits, and new small features.[/center]
[B]Features:[/B] (What all was changed from v1)
-Added a Fun Pk Arena. -Added the log in announcements, and the alert system. (Tutorial) -Fixed prayer draining, and prayer bonuses. Version 1's leeches where better than turmoil, and everything drained VERY quickly. All that has been fixed now. -Various special attack edits, including correct korasi's effect (other than mage hitting), almost every dragon item's special, every godsword, and any bow specials. -Changed the gameframe. (Super quick fix) -Fixed the Auto-Cache Downloader. -Changed prices and made them more suitable to the server. -Fixed herblore up a bit. Some potions didn't give the right bonuses and/or didn't drain right. -Improved combat. Not nearly as many 0's. -Fixed dead locking. -Fixed many items that equipped in the wrong slots. -Changed a couple of commands. (Made them more efficient) -Fixed the private chat messages not always sending glitch. -Added "Destroying" objects. (Look in config class) -Fixed the Dragon Dagger glitch that helped you hit really high with it's special. -Reworked thieving a slight bit. -Fixed a good amount of dupes. (Thanks to tutorials)
[U]I've done a great deal more than this, I just CBA to try to remember every little detail I've added in the past couple of weeks.[/U]
[B]Old Features:[/B]
-602 Anims/Gfx/ -Chaotics/Spirit Shields/PVP Armours -Tormented Demons -All skills working except Summoning and Hunter. -Almost every special works. -Good/Decent Economy if ran as is. -Pking/PvP. -Curse Prayers With Anims/Gfx/Effects -Clan Chat -Working SkillCape emotes. -All ancient spells work, all modern combat spells work, and Vengeance works. -Donator options. Including donator zone teleport/switch spellbook/full killcount. -2 Donator Shops. One is a Barrows Shop, the other is a Rare Shop (not Party Hats and H'Weens). -Custom Quest Tab. -Lock EXP Tab. -PK Point/Slayer Points, and Shops for them. -Bosses like Jad, General Graardor, Kree, etc. -Minigames (Pest Control,Duel Arena Etc). -Hp bar/10x Hit/Hitmarks Switching/Zoom -RFD Quest and Shop
[B] Pictures:[/B]
Log in announcement. [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/PIC1.png[/img]
Alert System. (Sends it to everyone on the server.) [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/PIC2.png[/img]
New Fun PK Arena. [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/PIC3.png[/img]
Special bar fully working + new gameframe. [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/PIC4.png[/img]
Dark Bow Spec timed 99% like RuneScape's. [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/PIC5.png[/img]
Leeches, soul split, and turmoil all working with the correct bonuses. [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/PIC6.png[/img]
[B] Old Pictures:[/B]
[IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/SlayerShop.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/PkShop.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/donorShop.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/PCStore.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/donatorzone.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/donorOptions.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/x10.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/warriorsguild.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/barrows.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/DagKings.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/godwars.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/Jad.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/Home.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/InfoBook.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/zoomin.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/zoomout.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/stats.png[/img] [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt314/Time_of_Rune/BrokenX/curses.png[/img]
[B] Download Link:[/B] [url=http://www.multiupload.com/EROCK665XD]http://www.multiupload.com/EROCK665XD[/url] [url=http://www.multiupload.com/EROCK665XD]http://www.multiupload.com/EROCK665XD[/url] [url=http://www.multiupload.com/EROCK665XD]http://www.multiupload.com/EROCK665XD[/url]
[size=36pt][center][b] This is not DSPK or Hybrid PvP. This was originally IntdubPk.[/b][/center][/size]
[size=24pt][b]If you call this a leech, it proves that you are retarded. Actually read and compare codes from Intdubpk and you will realize that I've put A LOT of work into this..[/b][/size]

item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

1st:

Hey could you help me, The server works fine for me (im on windows xp) but my friend is trying to join and the client just pops up for 2 seconds then exits. (he has windows 7) Please i was looking forward to coding your amazing server

  1. say “programming” instead of coding please …
  2. tell your friend to edit the batch file and take out the word “exit” and add the word “pause” so we can see the actual error.

Read full topic
